name: Diamonte Dream (Beta)
description:
"Blast your pyjama powers out into the dream world, in "Diamonte Dream", an overly saturated and overly punishing arcade shooter.

Play as heroic Kabooki Boy, out to save his beloved Kabooki World from the despondent, and archaic, spectrum sucking color morphing monster mob!

Fly, fight and fall across 12 colorful levels, collecting the sacred diamonte magic shards along to way to save the color of reality!"

This a beta version and development will not continue past this update.

- vander hum

Minimum System Requirements:

Game requires Adobe Flash Player 11.0 or higher to run.

512 mb Ram

15mb Hard Drive space
